RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 33. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MOST ADORABLE was bumped by MOTOWN HARBOR into MI CANCION at the start, sprinted clear soon thereafter, set all the pace, widened into the stretch under mild right handed urging and prevailed under a strong hand ride. GEMSHINE allowed to settle, closed determinedly under left handed urging in the four path through deep stretch but was too late. BOLD NICKY chased the winner into the stretch then faded. MI CANCION bumped the winner at the start and was no threat. MOTOWN HARBOR was bumped by the winner at the start and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Gemshine
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, late rally 4path, gaining, good effort,

ENTRY.NAME: Most Adorable
ENTRY.OWNER: Yoder Susan and Rivera Alan Yahir
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, quick lead,widened upper stretch, lasted, hand ride

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Timothy A. Heinrichs MD & Bryan R.Heinrichs

ENTRY.NAME: Mi Cancion
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Motown Harbor
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Bold Nicky
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, faded lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 75. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR TWO YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 22 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ONE WAY FARRIOR stalked pace the pace into the stretch, rallied four wide under right then left handed urging and was along in time. POKER PARTNER away alertly, set a pressured pace two then three wide until deep stretch and was no match for the winner. LUCKY COUGAR never far back, finished with good courage along the rail under right handed urging. EL BAMBINO failed to menace. UNTROUBLED pressed the pace along the inside into the stretch and gave way late. ROYALLY FLUSHED trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: El Bambino
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Untroubled
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace inside, gave way late

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Cougar
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished well rail, right handed urging,

ENTRY.NAME: Royally Flushed
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Poker Partner
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, 2-3wide, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: One Way Farrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied 4 wide, in time

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 42. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STORMINATOR never far back, closed willingly inside rivals under left then right handed urging, made the lead inside the furlong marker and drew off under brisk handling. SMARTASSET vied for lead the lead three wide and gamely gained second. EXTRA CRAFTY stumbled inward at the start, trailed early then found her best stride late inside rivals. HOLLYS SUPER STAR sprinted to the lead soon after the start, set a pressured pace off the rail until deep stretch, drifted then was outfinished. DOMINUS O'S ME failed to menace. WINDY VALLEY pressed the early pace two wide and was through after a half. J. P INDY was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Hollys Super Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace off rail, drifted, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Windy Valley
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Extra Crafty
ENTRY.OWNER: Poe Racing Stable LLC and 8 and 3 Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled inward start, trailed, best stride late inside

ENTRY.NAME: Smartasset
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide, dug in late, gained second

ENTRY.NAME: J. P Indy
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Storminator
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, closed willingly inside, late lead, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Dominus O's Me
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta Racing Stable and Quinteros Delia
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 12800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MAY 22. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: T MONEY dropped inside near the five furlong marker, closed willingly through the stretch under left handed urging inside the leader, made the lead late and drew clear. TWICE AS SMART rushed to the lead soon after the start, set the pace in the two path until deep stretch then couldn't handle the winner. MR. TRIPLEDOUBLE allowed to settle, found his best stride late in the four path. HROTHGAR trailed into the stretch then passed tiring rivals in the four path. UHAVETOBEKITTENME had speed from the start, improved position in the four path through the turn then came up empty. BROADWAY JONES chased the winner along the inside and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Broadway Jones
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Twice as Smart
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace 2path, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Tripledouble
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, best stride late 4path

ENTRY.NAME: T Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped inside 5/8p, closed willingly, left handed urging, clear

ENTRY.NAME: Hrothgar
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Uhavetobekittenme
ENTRY.COMMENT: improved position 4path turn, empty,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 89. Claiming Purse 14900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 22 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).

CLAIM.OWNER: Burnsworth Richard and Ultra Championship Racing LLC

RACE.FOOTNOTES: INSIDE STUNT broke in front, set all the pace, responded under left handed urging through mid stretch and won going away. RIKIO never far back, had a mild late rally in the six path and finished second best. MAYITO unhurried early, finished with good courage in the three path. STRIKE A BEAT trailed early, swung wide and closed gap late. UPTOWN GUY pressed the pace along the inside through the turn then weakened. STRASBOURG was no factor. HINK'S PALADIN chased the winner two wide and was through after a half. FRANK N DUCKY close up five wide, faltered in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Mayito
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, finished well, 3path

ENTRY.NAME: Uptown Guy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace inside, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Hink's Paladin
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Strasbourg
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Strike a Beat
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, swung wide, closed gap late

ENTRY.NAME: Frank N Ducky
ENTRY.COMMENT: close 5 wide, faltered lane

ENTRY.NAME: Rikio
ENTRY.OWNER: Cline, Robert and Lucas, Robert A.
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, mild rally 6path, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Inside Stunt
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, drew off, left handed urging,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 74. Allowance Purse 36200. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 22 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considere d In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IN TROUBLED WATERS never far back, closed willingly along the rail under right handed urging to make the lead in deep stretch and drew clear. ANCHORWOMAN stalked the pace through the turn, rallied to make the lead in upper stretch then was no match for the winner. I'M LEGIT trailed early, closed rapidly along the rail through the stretch and just missed getting up for second. MAYBE FRANKY settled mid pack and improved position in the five path. LADY FORTUNE settled inside, angled out on the turn then passed tiring rivals through the stretch in the six path. SHAKEURSKINNYLEGS dueled for the lead two wide down the backstretch, inherited a clear advantage midway on the turn, set the pace to the top of the stretch then was used up. FACTISIMFLASHY contested the lead inside rivals into the turn then flattened out. MISS ELLIE flashed speed and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Fortune
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside, angled out turn, passed tiring rivals 6path

ENTRY.NAME: In Troubled Waters
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, rallied rail, right handed urging, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: I'm Legit
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed early, closed fast rail, missed second

ENTRY.NAME: Factisimflashy
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled inside rivals turn, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Maybe Franky
ENTRY.COMMENT: improved position 5path

ENTRY.NAME: Shakeurskinnylegs
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, led turn, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Ellie
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Anchorwoman
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked early, rallied 3 wide, led, no match for winner,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 55. Allowance Purse 33700. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 22 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowanc es).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JIM'S RIVER RUNNER prompted the early pace along the inside, dropped back on the turn, came on again under left handed urging and proved best in a stretch long drive. ORVILLE B vied for the lead three wide and finished second best under right handed urging in a game effort. WAR ON THE RIVER set a pressured pace two wide into the stretch then was outfinished. AGNELLO CITY went evenly. LITTLE RONS ROCKET found his best stride late in the four path. ORLEANS STORM was bumped then steadied at the start, saved ground, improved position into the stretch then leveled off. MUCH TIMES TWO well placed, failed to respond. PLAYING BALL was no factor. CHECK THE FACTS bore in bumping ORLEANS STORM at the start, veered in shortly thereafter and was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Orleans Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, steadied start, saved ground,

ENTRY.NAME: Check the Facts
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in, bumped start, veered in, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Jim's River Runner
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, dropped back turn, came again, gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Little Rons Rocket
ENTRY.COMMENT: best stride late 4path

ENTRY.NAME: War On the River
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Agnello City
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Much Times Two
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Orville B
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3 wide, long drive, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Playing Ball
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 41. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IPPOLITO'S WONDER prompted the pace two wide into the turn, took charge, set the balance of the pace and widened through the stretch at will to win as much the best. SOMETHING ON TAP stalked the pace three wide down the backstretch, made the lead, was passed by the winner before a half and finished clearly second best. MARQUITOS M never far back, found his best stride late in the four path. WHY KENNY WHY slow early, swung wide and closed gap late. HARTSTEIN sped to the lead soon after the start, set a pressured pace along the inside into the turn then weakened. NO MAS CERVEZA failed to menace. MY HOMBRE had good early speed along the inside then faded. RUNAWAY RUSSELL well placed, lacked the needed response. RAISE YOU ONE was no factor. MY TICKET was outrun. FORMYBOYS was through after a half. R CLIFFHANGER had brief speed.

ENTRY.NAME: Hartstein
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace inside turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: My Hombre
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, inside, faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Ippolito's Wonder
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, took over turn, full of run, much the best,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Mr. & Mrs. David J. Casalinova Sr.

ENTRY.NAME: Why Kenny Why
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, swung wide, closed gap late

ENTRY.NAME: Raise You One
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: R Cliffhanger
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Runaway Russell
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: My Ticket
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Something On Tap
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3 wide, led between calls, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: No Mas Cerveza
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Formyboys
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half,
